content: Alkermes Plc's experimental depression drug significantly reduced symptoms in patients suffering from major depressive disorder who were not helped by standard treatments in a pivotal late-stage trial  the company said on Thursday  and its shares surged 47 percent.

title: Alkermes depression drug succeeds in key trial; shares surge

content: (Corrects headline to say company will not pursue further development of its drug.
